channel.title: Cisco on Nathan Curry - Sysadmin, RHCSA, CCENT
channel.description: Recent content in Cisco on Nathan Curry - Sysadmin, RHCSA, CCENT

item.title: VLANs with Cisco and Ubiquiti
item.description: My girlfriend is out of town, so now’s a great time to set up VLANs. The Map I’m switching to 10.3.3.0/24, since that’s easier to type than 192.168.7.0/24, especially in the dark. Private LAN VLAN 1 10.3.3.0/25 Pool 80-126 Guest WiFi VLAN 99 10.3.3.128/26 No routing to other subnets IoT VLAN 5 10.3.3.208/28 Restricted routes available to other VLANs DMZ VLAN 10 10.

item.title: Cisco ICND1 Recap
item.description: I just tentatively passed the ICND1 with a 925/1000, and I’m pleased with my performance. Obviously, I am honor-bound (and perhaps more importantly, legally bound) to not discuss the exam contents. Preparation I began studying in late April. At the suggestion of a family friend and retired CCIE, I worked off the following materials: An all-in-one rack on eBay that had 3 1841 routers, 2 layer2 switches, and 1 layer3 switch for $300.

item.title: CCENT Lab Notes, Part 3
item.description: This is a continuation of my previous notes on CCENT labs. These Ranet labs are significantly better-designed than the previous set of labs, though the evaluation at the end of the exam doesn’t always work. These are my notes for all the labs that deal with ICND1 objectives, and I will save the ICND2 objectives for later when I review. SPOILERS: DO NOT CONTINUE READING IF YOU PLAN ON DOING THE LABS

item.title: CCENT Lab Notes, Part 2
item.description: This is a log of my work on last 6 of these PackTracer labs for the ICND1 exam. SPOILER ALERT: Do your labs first, these are notes on how I resolved them. Lab 7 PC0 cannot ping PC1, can you fix it? I verify that both PCs can ping as far as the outward-facing interface of R3. I furthermore verify that both R3 can ping R1, but not from its inside interface.

item.title: CCENT Lab Notes, Part 1
item.description: This is a log of my work on the first 6 of these PackTracer labs for the ICND1 exam. SPOILERS FOLLOW!!! This is not a guide on how to approach the problems, it’s a review of completed work. This perhaps has educational merit, but please continue only after having completed the labs yourself. Lab 1 Switch0 is configured as DHCP server but not working. Can you fix it?
